mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_group_appeal_leader (appeal_id, student_id, group_name, class_id, group_avatar, group_introduction, appeal_date) VALUES (#{appealId}, #{studentId}, #{groupName}, #{classId}, #{groupAvatar}, #{groupIntroduction}, #{appealDate})
mapper.select: SELECT bgal.appeal_id, bgal.student_id, bgal.group_name, bs.student_name, bs.avatar AS student_avatar, bgal.appeal_date FROM b_group_appeal_leader bgal LEFT OUTER JOIN b_student bs ON bgal.student_id = bs.student_id WHERE bgal.class_id = #{classId}
